Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to, street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to, street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between O'Hare and Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to police activity at Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Forest Park and Jefferson Park at this time.

Shuttle buses are now available from O'Hare to Jefferson Park to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
